DOC.brief_summary: Arm exercise influences arm volume and symptoms in breast cancer related lymphedema.
DOC.brief_title: Exercise and Breast Cancer Related Lymphedema: Influence of Muscle Group and Sequence on Volume Change in Swollen and Normal Arms
DOC.criteria: unilateral arm lymphedema as a result of breast cancer treatment completion of breast cancer treatments arm lymphedema onset 3 months or more after surgery and persistent for at least 6 months in the maintenance phase of lymphedema treatment women with recurrent cancer intercurrent diseases affecting the swollen arm lack of understanding of the Hebrew language
